intro: Psychotria potanthera, commonly known as the yellow psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its striking yellow flowers, which are typically clustered in inflorescences. Its leaves are usually elliptical and have a glossy texture. Psychotria potanthera is often found in humid, shaded environments within tropical rainforests.
